game.title: The Stolen Amulet
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen amulet from the Blacksmith.
game.description: The Blacksmith has stolen the amulet of the Elder. You must retrieve it and return it to the Elder.

task.objective: Find the Blacksmith at the Market.
task.description: The Blacksmith can be found in his shop near the entrance.

task.objective: Retrieve the amulet from the secret compartment in the Blacksmith's safe.
task.description: Look for a hidden chest behind the counter.

task.objective: Return the amulet to the Elder at his Hut outside town.
task.description: The path leads through the forest on the eastern side of the village.
